name: levitate
effect: This Pokémon is immune to ground-type moves, spikes, toxic spikes, and arena trap. This ability is disabled during gravity or ingrain, or while holding an iron ball. This ability is not disabled during roost.

flavor_text.sun_moon: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
